item.title: P77 Ancient District by Martin Deschambault
item.description:
I did a sketch of the spaceship a long time ago and I wanted to do an artwork with the same spaceship on a different context.

I started on iPad Pro / Procreate for the original sketch, line drawing and black&white sketch. The final painting was made with Photoshop.
item.content:encoded:
I did a sketch of the spaceship a long time ago and I wanted to do an artwork with the same spaceship on a different context.

I started on iPad Pro / Procreate for the original sketch, line drawing and black&white sketch. The final painting was made with Photoshop.

item.title: Goodbye Ubisoft.... I am joining the studio 343 Industries/Microsoft by Martin Deschambault
item.content:encoded:
After working at Ubisoft for 10 years mostly 9 years on the Assassin’s Creed franchise where I took part of AC2, AC Revelations, AC Black Flag and most recently AC Origins, it's with mixed emotions that I announce I am leaving Ubisoft.
I am so proud to have had the opportunity to work with the team of Assassin’s Creed and especially working with Raphael Lacoste for the last 7 years. I had an amazing experience crafting and designing the different worlds of AC with the team, I will miss you all guys!

I am doing the big move to another city in the Seattle area. I am so excited to announce that I will joint the studio 343 Industries/Microsoft to work with Nicolas “Sparth" Bouvier, Darren Bacon and the team on the next Halo Infinite. I've always been passionate about science fiction and I can’t wait start this new adventure.

item.title: Project 77 by Martin Deschambault
item.description:
P77 city landscape. I keep playing with photo texture mixed with the smudge tool, so much fun and efficient.
I have the feeling that I got inspired by the last trailer of cyberpunk 2077 The game look amazing!

item.title: Project77 by Martin Deschambault
item.description:
This is the artwork I did during the Artstation video.
I had no plans about what to do !!! scary!!! I decided to sketch until I started to see something interesting... I hope you like the process

If you want to watch the video, this is the link:
https://magazine.artstation.com/2018/01/martin-deschambault-project-77-illustation-tutorial/

Art book of Project 77 is available worldwide on Amazon:
http://a.co/cju0wHm
Canadians: http://a.co/22Q91C6

item.title: Project 77 by Martin Deschambault
item.description:
New artwork for P77 with a 4 steps working progress.

I was inspired by rock balancing sculptures! I think it could be epic and scary at the same time to have these giant rocks above your head.

Art book of Project 77 is available worldwide on Amazon:
http://a.co/cju0wHm

item.title: Project 77 by Martin Deschambault
item.description:
2017 will be hard to beat

This year was very exciting with the release of Assassin's Creed Origins, a project that I worked on for 3.5 years.

And after 6 years of developing the world of P77, Artstation published the art book of Project 77.

I am sure 2018 will be full of surprises and exciting moments! I wish you all a happy new year.

Here is the last artwork I created in 2017 for the art book of Project77.
item.content:encoded:
2017 will be hard to beat

This year was very exciting with the release of Assassin's Creed Origins, a project that I worked on for 3.5 years.

And after 6 years of developing the world of P77, Artstation published the art book of Project 77.

I am sure 2018 will be full of surprises and exciting moments! I wish you all a happy new year.

Here is the last artwork I created in 2017 for the art book of Project77.

Martin Deschambault on ArtStation

item.title: Project 77 by Martin Deschambault
item.description:
Great News!!!!
The Art book of Project 77 published by Artstation Media is NOW!!!!! available on Amazon
Perfect timing with the Black Friday!
This is the link for Amazon Canada:
https://www.amazon.ca/Project-77-Martin-Deschambault/dp/1775070700/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1511358809&sr=8-1&keywords=project+77
This is the link for Amazon ''The rest of the world'':
https://www.amazon.com/dp/1775070700
